sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AnalyticsService } from 'src/app/services/analytics/analytics.service'; import { LanguageService } from 'src/app/services/language/language.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.scss'] }) export class AboutComponent implements OnInit { cvName: string = "" constructor( public analyticsService: AnalyticsService, public languageService: LanguageService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { } downloadCV(){ this.languageService.translateService.get("Header.cvName").subscribe(val => { this.cvName = val console.log("val Hello guy",val) // app url let url = window.location.href; // Open a new window with the CV window.open(url + "/../assets/cv/" + this.cvName, "_blank"); }) } }

01. {{ "AboutMe.Title" | translate }}

  • {{ "Header.cvBtn" | translate }}
